casebody.data:
HILL
v.
HILL, et al. No. 638P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 28, 2006. W. Scott Jones, Asheville, for Garford Tony Hill, et al.

Prior report: 173 N.C.App. 309, 622 S.E.2d 503.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th day of July 2006 by Plaintiff for Temporary Stay During the Pendency of Appellant's Motion to Renew the Stay Previously Entered by the Court:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 28th day of July 2006."

Justices MARTIN and TIMMONS-GOODSON recused.
